page.title: 07EAST WITTERING LIBRARY
page.content: The library was opened on 29th November 1973.There are 3,744 people who are registered as being members of the library and 101 new members were registered last year.We found that our library has 12,563 books:5,306 adult fiction,4,147 adult non_fiction,2,678 junior and 342 reference books.The reference section also contains telephone directories,bus and train timetables,local history facts dictionaries,encyclopaedias,Parish Council meeting minutes from East and West Wittering and applications for planning permission.It also has a register of groups and societies that meet in the Witterings.The library also has many notices which concern the people of our village including a diary of events,travel information, Church news,adult education and age concern.
